itunes:title: JUN 14, 2022 - LEAKED TEXTS: HANNITY ASKED TRUMP TO PARDON HUNTER BIDEN
title: JUN 14, 2022 - LEAKED TEXTS: HANNITY ASKED TRUMP TO PARDON HUNTER BIDEN
description:
Jack Posobiec reveals leaked texts from Sean Hannity asking Trump to pardon Hunter Biden. U.S. inflation is at a four-decade high pressuring the Federal Reserve to increase interest rates more aggressively. Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell has hinted of an imminent recession. All of this as court documents accuse trangender actor Ezra Miller of grooming a 12-year-old girl for six years resulting in her parents filing suit. The now 18-year old woman claims her parents are ‘transphobic’. Finally, Chairman Xi authorizes the People’s Liberation Army (PLA) to conduct special Chinese military operations near Taiwan. 


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec

content:encoded:
Jack Posobiec reveals leaked texts from Sean Hannity asking Trump to pardon Hunter Biden. U.S. inflation is at a four-decade high pressuring the Federal Reserve to increase interest rates more aggressively. Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell has hinted of an imminent recession. All of this as court documents accuse trangender actor Ezra Miller of grooming a 12-year-old girl for six years resulting in her parents filing suit. The now 18-year old woman claims her parents are ‘transphobic’. Finally, Chairman Xi authorizes the People’s Liberation Army (PLA) to conduct special Chinese military operations near Taiwan.
